title: Into secondary school (TEFC)
creator_credit: John Fletcher, John Arnold and Nuffield Foundation
brief_description: Application of the Nuffield mathematics course for children during their first two years of secondary school. Pupils at the Grass Royal Secondary Modern school, Yeovil and the Elliott Comprehensive, Putney are seen on their projects and the physical problems of coping with 100 children in one class session are discussed.
